title.text: Constantly growing, 24 years old, ambitious web developer based in Warsaw. Absolutely passionate about frontend, React enthusiast. Already experienced, looking forward to challenges and expanding qualifications.

work.title: HOW DO I WORK?
work.text: I work well in groups and keep my code clean and simple. I pay attention to order and take care of the details. I always try to do my job as simply and as well as possible. My primary interest is React and I'm constantly improving my skills at it.

data.title: PROFESSIONAL EXP
data.describe: I had an opportunity to gain around 2 years of professional experience.

data.title: YEARS OLD
data.describe: A lot of desire and strength for further development.

data.title: REACT EXP
data.describe: I am an absoulte React enthusiast, already experienced.

privately.title: BESIDES WORK?
privately.text: I love traveling and taking pictures of beautiful places. I willingly participate in social gatherings. Music, movies, TV series, books - I'm happy to talk about any of these things. The next very important thing of my life is British football. I'm also interested in investments.

experience.title: PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE?
experience.text: Even before graduation, I took a full-time job at MDBootstrap. There I actively participate in the development of the React UI KIT. For the last time I mainly worked on projects for clients, not connected with the UI KIT. It helped me to understand that creating web aplications is what I would most like to do.

timeline.title: TIMELINE?
timeline.text: How had my employment looked like over the past few years.

techstack.title: MAIN TECHSTACK?
techstack.text: I use technologies such as React, Redux (Toolkit & RTK Query), TypeScript, Git, Jest, HTML & CSS/SCSS at work every day. I also had the opportunity to come across technologies like Next, Node and Wordpress.

data.title: Redux (Toolkit & RTK Query)
data.about: Repeatedly working on projects using this technology.

data.title: TypeScript
data.about: If I create something in React, then only with TS!

education.title: WHERE I STUDIED?
education.text: From 2017 to 2021 I was a student at Warsaw Military University of Technology (Computer Science). Currently, I combine work with part-time studies at Warsaw University of Technology (Computer Science).

contact.title: Send me a message
contact.text: Interested in working together? Contact me!
